Function Documentation

def GameApp::game_app_3d::UpdateSplash (   self,
  a_Message 
)

self.UpdateSplash( "Loading House..." ) house = Object3d( "%s/home/House010.obj" % self.DATA_PATH, None, object_type=OBJECT_3D_MESH, a_Colour=[1.0, 1.0, 0.0])

house.SetScale( 200 ) house.m_XRot.SetAngle( -90 ) house.SetPosition( 0, 0, -4 ) oadd( house ) self.house = house
